title: Watch: Inside Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's Rs 32 Crore Plush Alibaug Bungalow With Temperature-Cont.. - NDTV Sports
summary:
Watch: Inside Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's Rs 32 Crore Plush Alibaug Bungalow With Temperature-Controlled Pool

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Star cricketer Virat Kohli recently returned to Mumbai from his holiday home in Alibaug, showcasing a lavish property complete with luxury amenities.

  • The bungalow was built on an 8-acre plot acquired for approximately Rs 19 crore in 2022.
  • Spanning 10,000 square feet, it features a temperature-controlled pool, bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, and a sprawling garden.
  • Kohli invested an estimated Rs 10.5 crore to Rs 13 crore in the construction of the villa, which showcases high-end materials including Italian marble.
  • Amidst his recent poor performance in cricket, there is speculation about Kohli and Anushka relocating to London in the future.
  • Kohli is included in the probables list for the last two fixtures of the Ranji Trophy, although his participation is doubtful.
“It is unlikely that he would participate in any of the two games.”

This luxurious home represents a significant investment for the couple and reflects their status in the celebrity sphere.
newTitle: Inside Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma's Luxurious Alibaug Bungalow

Celebrities Celebrate Pongal and Makar Sankranti with Heartfelt Wishes

Published on: Jan 15, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The festive spirit was alive among celebrities as they celebrated Pongal and Makar Sankranti with their loved ones. From newlywed couples to doting parents, many took to social media to share glimpses of their celebrations, expressing gratitude, love, and well-wishes for the year ahead.

Take a look:

  • Actors Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya celebrated their first Pongal, Sankranti after wedding.
  • Actor Nayanthara shared a glimpse of her celebrations and captioned, "Let us express our heartfelt thanks to the Tamil farmers who make us live. Happy Pongal wishes.."
  • Actor Rashmika Mandanna wished her followers saying, “Happiest Sankranthi/Pongal my loves. I hope this year brings you all the love, happiness and good health.”
  • Actor Keerthy Suresh introduced her grandson during Pongal celebrations, wishing everyone a beautiful festival.
  • Actor Shilpa Shetty Kundra celebrated with her mother and visited the temple, sharing festive greetings.
“Happy Makar Sankranti. Til gud ghya god god bola.” - Shilpa Shetty Kundra

This festive season has been marked by love and gratitude among friends and family, capturing the essence of Pongal and Makar Sankranti.
newTitle: Celebrities Celebrate Pongal and Makar Sankranti with Heartfelt Wishes

summary:
When Sharmila Tagore spoke about converting to Islam when she married Tiger Pataudi: 'You couldn't be flippant...'

Published on: N/A Source: Times of India

Sharmila Tagore shares her personal journey of converting to Islam upon marrying Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi, emphasizing the challenges faced in their interfaith union.

  • Sharmila converted to Islam to marry Tiger Pataudi, revealing the complexities involved.
  • She expressed that the conversion was neither easy nor hard, and one had to face it sincerely.
  • Sharmila learned more about both Hinduism and Islam after her conversion.
  • She shared her first meeting with her mother-in-law and the respectful bond they formed.
  • Despite receiving death threats during their wedding preparations, the ceremony went smoothly.
“In Kolkata, when I was getting married, my parents were getting telegrams saying that bullets shall speak... despite the tension, the wedding and reception went smoothly.” - Sharmila Tagore

This personal account highlights the societal pressures and deep commitment within their interfaith marriage.

title: Rakesh Roshan's ‘South cinema is successful because they’re not breaking any path’ comment irks Reddit: ‘What nonsense’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Rakesh Roshan's comments on South cinema's storytelling spark backlash on Reddit

Publication Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Rakesh Roshan commented on the success of South cinema, stating that while it has made technological advancements, its storytelling remains stuck in traditional formats. This has led to criticism on social media.

  • Last year, South cinema nearly outperformed Bollywood at the box office, reigniting debates about their respective successes.
  • Roshan believes South cinema is successful because it avoids risking new storytelling paths.
  • Many Reddit users backlash against Roshan's views, calling out perceived arrogance in Bollywood.
“What about Eega? Can a Bollywood movie with a fly as the hero break any records?” - Reddit User

The backlash has highlighted a divide in opinions about the evolution of Indian cinema, with many arguing that regional films are more innovative. Roshan's film 'Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai' was also re-released to mark its 25th anniversary.
newTitle: Rakesh Roshan's Comments on South Cinema Spark Backlash on Reddit

title: Oscars 2025 may get cancelled for the first time in 96 years due to LA wildfires: Report - Hindustan Times
summary:
Oscars 2025 May Be Canceled Due to LA Wildfires

Date: January 15, 2025, Source: Hindustan Times

The devastating wildfires in Los Angeles pose a significant threat to the Oscars ceremony, potentially marking the first cancellation in 96 years due to extensive destruction and loss of life.

  • LA wildfires have caused evacuations and significant loss of life.
  • The Oscars may be canceled for the first time in its history.
  • There is a shift in focus towards support and fundraising as the ceremony is under review.
  • A secret contingency plan is considered due to the severity of the wildfires.
  • The nomination voting period has been extended to January 17.
  • 25 lives have been lost so far, with numbers expected to rise.
“The board’s main concern at this time is to not appear as if they are celebrating while many Angelenos are dealing with heartbreak and unimaginable loss.”

The ongoing situation of the LA wildfires will heavily influence the decisions regarding the Oscars 2025, considering both immediate responses and long-term implications for the ceremony.
newTitle: Oscars 2025 May Be Canceled Due to LA Wildfires

title: Shakti Kapoor reveals he begged wife Shivangi Kolhapure to give up promising film career, marry him: ‘Be a housewife’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shakti Kapoor ‘begged’ wife Shivangi Kolhapure to give up a promising film career to marry him: ‘I apologised and said…’

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

Bollywood actor Shakti Kapoor opens up about his relationship with wife Shivangi Kolhapure, detailing how their love story began and the sacrifices she made for him.

  • Shakti Kapoor and Shivangi Kolhapure have been married for 43 years.
  • Shivangi left a promising career in acting and singing to marry Shakti, despite family opposition.
  • The couple eloped in 1982 and later reconciled with their families.
  • They have two children, including actress Shraddha Kapoor.
“I went to her and begged her. I apologized and told her I wanted to marry her... She gave up her singing career and everything else for me.” - Shakti Kapoor

This heartfelt revelation highlights the deep bond and sacrifices made in their relationship, showcasing a love that has stood the test of time.
newTitle: Shakti Kapoor Reveals His Proposal to Shivangi Kolhapure and Her Sacrifices

title: Coldplay India Concert: Traffic Restrictions Imposed In Navi Mumbai You Must Know - News18
summary:
Coldplay India Concert: Traffic Restrictions Imposed In Navi Mumbai You Must Know

Last Updated: January 15, 2025, 14:35 IST

Days ahead of Coldplay’s mega show in Navi Mumbai, traffic restrictions have been imposed in the city to ensure safe and smooth movement during the concert at Dr D.Y. Patil Stadium on January 18, 19, and 21.

  • Traffic restrictions will be in effect from 2 PM to 12 AM on concert days.
  • Heavy vehicles are banned from entering, travelling, or parking on roads within the Navi Mumbai Police Commissionerate jurisdiction.
  • Essential goods vehicles, fire brigades, ambulances, and government vehicles are exempt.
  • Commuters are advised to plan routes ahead and avoid roads near the stadium during restricted hours.
  • This marks Coldplay’s first performance in India since 2016, with an additional show scheduled due to high demand.
“Commuters are advised to plan their routes accordingly on the concert dates and avoid roads near the stadium during the restricted hours,” said DCP Kakade.

This concert series is highly anticipated and follows Coldplay's last visit to India in 2016, ensuring significant public attention and excitement.
newTitle: Coldplay India Concert: Traffic Restrictions in Navi Mumbai

title: Author Neil Gaiman denies sexual assault allegations made by 8 women, admits he's ‘far from a perfect person’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Neil Gaiman Denies Sexual Assault Allegations by Eight Women

Publication Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Neil Gaiman has responded to recent allegations of sexual misconduct made by eight women, asserting that he has never engaged in non-consensual activity. He expressed his dismay over the accusations and acknowledged his imperfections.

  • Gaiman denies all allegations of sexual misconduct and asserts he has never engaged in non-consensual sexual activity.
  • The allegations include claims of a sexual assault occurring in a bath and participation in BDSM activities.
  • Gaiman admits to being careless with people's feelings and acknowledges the need for personal growth.
  • Some allegations were labeled by Gaiman as distorted or fabricated, but he takes responsibility for any missteps.
  • The accusations have impacted adaptations of his works, including the series Good Omens.
“I’ve never engaged in non-consensual sexual activity with anyone. Ever.” - Neil Gaiman

The situation highlights a complex balancing act between personal and public narratives, with Gaiman committing to making amends and transforming his actions.
newTitle: Neil Gaiman Denies Sexual Assault Allegations by Eight Women

title: Marco star Unni Mukundan reacts to contrasting audience reactions, says he's sure film won't do good on an OTT platform - Hindustan Times
summary:
Unni Mukundan Addresses Audience Reactions to 'Marco' and Its OTT Future

Publication Date: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The film 'Marco' starring Unni Mukundan has generated mixed reactions regarding its portrayal of violence. In a recent interview, Mukundan discussed his thoughts on audience responses and expressed skepticism about the film's success on OTT platforms.

  • Unni Mukundan, who produced and stars in 'Marco', acknowledges mixed audience reactions.
  • He believes that disturbing content is a part of entertainment, especially in a theatrical setting.
  • Mukundan doubts the film's potential success on OTT, stating that some films are designed for the theater experience.
  • 'Marco' is considered one of the most violent Indian films, released on December 20, 2024.
“I don't think Marco will do any good on the OTT platform. I already feel that. I am going to get ripped off most probably on the logic part… because a certain kind of cinema is designed for the theatres.”

Overall, Mukundan emphasizes the importance of the theatrical experience and the intelligence of the audience in processing violent themes in cinema.
newTitle: Unni Mukundan Addresses Audience Reactions to 'Marco' and Its OTT Future

title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 15, 2025 - Hindustan Times
summary:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 15, 2025

Publication Date: January 15, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope offers insights into the love and relationship dynamics for each zodiac sign on January 15, 2025. It emphasizes understanding, patience, and communication to strengthen bonds.

  • Aries: Focus on supporting loved ones and understanding the deeper aspects of love.
  • Taurus: Avoid temptation; loyalty is key to harmony in relationships.
  • Gemini: Encourage open communication to enhance intimacy.
  • Cancer: Show care through attentive listening to strengthen bonds.
  • Leo: Concentrate on nurturing your relationship without worrying about the future.
  • Virgo: Self-improvement is vital; take time for self-reflection.
  • Libra: Express affection in simple, meaningful ways.
  • Scorpio: Engage in deeper conversations for improved closeness.
  • Sagittarius: Handle minor conflicts thoughtfully to ensure loyalty.
  • Capricorn: Be brave in expressing your feelings to strengthen intimacy.
  • Aquarius: Introduce small acts of kindness to rekindle excitement.
  • Pisces: Reflect on your relationship before pursuing new interests.
“Love grows when talking and working with one another.”

This horoscope highlights the importance of nurturing love through understanding and communication, providing guidance for healthier relationships moving forward.
newTitle: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 15, 2025
